title: The race celestiall, or, A direct path to heauen by Henry Greenvvood, maister of arts and preacher of the word of God.
author: Greenwood, Henry, b. 1544 or 5.
publisher: by N.O. for Henry Bell, dwelling in holborne neere to the Crosse Keyes,
